title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: After performing the steps mentioned, the Navigator shows the file added in the specified location, but without any file extension.
EB: After performing the steps mentioned, the Navigator should show the file added in the specified location with the appropriate file extension.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon
4) In the dialog that appears, browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but omit the file extension since it is not requested
6) Click Ok

- Confirm that the Navigator shows the file added in the specified location with the appropriate file extension
